title: Automatic Upgrade - Novel Updates
author: 凤凰涅槃
description:
When he woke up, Luo Xiu found himself in a world full of spiritual aura, with countless powerful people, ferocious beasts—where human lives were like grass!

How can one survive in this world as a mortal?

“Ding, Strength +1!”

“Ding, Strength +1!”

“…”

“Ding, congratulations to the host, realm breakthrough – Martial Artist Realm!”

Feeling the abundant power in his body, Luo Xiu froze on the spot: “I didn’t do anything, how did I become a martial artist?”

“Ding, Strength +10!”

“Ding, Strength +10!”
“…”
“Ding, congratulations to the host, stage breakthrough – Martial Master Realm!

He swears to heaven and earth, he really didn’t do anything!

When did being powerful become so easy?>
